    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L5
    [use]                                   1         4
    [strict]                                5         11
    [;]                                     11        12

    [$]                                     4         5
    [what]                                  5         9

    ['fred|barney']                         12        25

    [while]                                 1         6
    [(]                                     7         8

    [chomp]                                 5         10

    [if]                                    5         7

    [/]                                     9         10

    [)]                                     33        34
    [{]                                     35        36

    [print]                                 2         7
    ['Matched: |$ `\n\t<$&>$|\\n']          8         11

    [}]                                     5         6
